016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.validator;
017
018import jakarta.faces.application.FacesMessage;
019import jakarta.faces.application.FacesMessage.Severity;
020import jakarta.faces.validator.ValidatorException;
021
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.List;
024
025/**
026 * TestData Store for Test Items which will be used by
027 * {@link AbstractValidatorTest}-<br>
028 * Class is prepared to be used as Fluent Interface
029 *
030 * @param <T> type of Test Item value
031 */
032public class TestItems<T> {
033
034    private final List<TestItem<T>> localItems = new ArrayList<>();
035
036    /**
037     * Add to TestData Store a Test item which must fail with
038     * {@link ValidatorException}
039     *
040     * @param value T invalid value which should cause a {@link ValidatorException}
041     * @return TestItems reference to this object
042     */
043    public TestItems<T> addInvalid(final T value) {
044        return this.addItem(false, value, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR, null);
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * Add to TestData Store a Test item which must fail with
049     * {@link ValidatorException}
050     *
051     * @param value   T invalid value which should cause a
052     *                {@link ValidatorException}
053     * @param message which should be set within the {@link ValidatorException}
054     * @return TestItems reference to this object
055     */
056    public TestItems<T> addInvalidWithMessage(final T value, final String message) {
057        return this.addItem(false, value, FacesMessage.SEVERITY_ERROR, message);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Add to TestData Store a Test item which must fail with
062     * {@link ValidatorException}
063     *
064     * @param value T invalid value which should cause a {@link ValidatorException}
065     * @return TestItems reference to this object
066     */
067    public TestItems<T> addValid(final T value) {
068        return this.addItem(true, value, null, null);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Add to TestData Store a Test item
073     *
074     * @param valid   indicating whether it is a valid or invalid item
075     * @param value   T value to be validated
076     * @param level   {@link Severity} represent message severity, usually
077     *                {@link FacesMessage#SEVERITY_ERROR}
078     * @param message which should be set within the {@link ValidatorException}
079     * @return TestItems reference to this object
080     */
081    private TestItems<T> addItem(final boolean valid, final T value, final Severity level, final String message) {
082        final var item = new TestItem<T>();
083        item.setTestValue(value);
084        item.setValid(valid);
085        item.setErrorMessage(message);
086        item.setSeverity(level);
087        localItems.add(item);
088        return this;
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * @return all valid test-items
093     */
094    List<TestItem<T>> allValid() {
095        return localItems.stream().filter(TestItem::isValid).toList();
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * @return all invalid test-items
100     */
101    List<TestItem<T>> allInvalid() {
102        return localItems.stream().filter(item -> !item.isValid()).toList();
103    }
104}
